description.message: Simple note sidebar which can be used to write a note, record thoughts, to-do list, meeting notes, etc.

textfoot.message: This software is licensed under the CC-GNU GPL. To view a copy of this license, visit

ratedes.message: And let everyone know about this great extension!

areyouhappy.message: Are you happy about Note Sidebar?

desrememberpage.message: If this option is enabled, it will not show you the reminder page

longdonatetext.message: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!

enjoyshare.message: Enjoy this extension and share it with others who you think will appreciate it.

titelsyncbrowser.message: Sync the extension settings with your other browser.

titeldownloadupgrade.message: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the video as if you were in the cinema.

showremember.message: Do not show this reminder page again when I open the options page

skipremember.message: Skip this, and open now the options page

welcomebasictext.message: Welcome on the Note Sidebar browser extension. Here a brief video about how to use the Note Sidebar extension in your web browser.

promotext.message: Want to use something new and amazing for your web browser? Try the $product$ Browser extension.

donatetext.message: Due to the very small number of donations the project may be closed. Please support further development with a Donation.

descolor.message: Change the background color of the toolbar

desdropshadow.message: Get a shadow effect below the toolbar

deshovertextcolor.message: Change the font color when you mouse is over a link

deshoverbackground.message: Change the background color when you mouse is over a link

desremrate.message: If you like Note Sidebar™, please do not hesitate to rate this extension to five stars now. This gives us courage to continue to maintain and improve this product for you. Writing a review is recommended, but not mandatory. If you do not have the time to write a review, you can rate it anonymously. It is important to give it ★★★★★. Thank you!

sharetexta.message: Get this Cool Note Sidebar browser extension

sharetextb.message: Hey, this is amazing! I tried the Note Sidebar browser extension just today.

sharetextc.message: The Best and Amazing Note Sidebar browser extension

sharetextd.message: Note Sidebar' browser extension is the Best Useful Tool. Download it and try it yourself!

permissionactivetab.message: This will only manage the Note Sidebar of the web page on the currently open tab page.

permissiontabs.message: This is needed for the following features: to show you the welcome and guide page, manage the Note Sidebar on all the open tabs, and to open the Options page.

permissioncontextmenu.message: This to add all the Note Sidebar item in the web browser context menu.

permissionstorage.message: This to save the settings on your local computer, and to sync it to your web browser account.

permissionscripting.message: This is to inject JavaScript and CSS code into websites.

desyoutube.message: Discover and learn more about Stefan's browser extension. Watch it now on YouTube.

desratebad.message: Sorry you have had this bad experience. Please let us know on how we can improve our extension for you.

desrategood.message: Happy to hear that you love Note Sidebar! Will you take a moment to rate us in the browser extension store? Your browser extension store reviews make a difference!

desratetitle.message: Do you love this browser extension?

desratebadtitle.message: How can we make it better?

destapstar.message: Tap a star to rate it on the browser extension store.

descontextmenu.message: Show the context menu to copy a text to the sidebar

firsttext.message: Hello and welcome. Type your message here.

descounter.message: Show the number of characters entered in the textarea

desvoices.message: Show the voice you want to hear for your text

desexportnotes.message: Export your notes to a TXT file

deslineheight.message: The line height for the text area

descolorlight.message: The text color in light mode

descolordark.message: The text color in dark mode

desbackgroundlight.message: The background color in light mode

desbackgrounddark.message: The background color in dark mode
